backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two catalogâ€‘related features with involved files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text summarizing major frontend calculator and catalog files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines CatalogItem type and a static predefined item list.
Number and currency formatting helpers using Intl.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Catalog UI with search, category grouping, and Add-item actions.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page managing line items, tax/discount inputs, and catalog integration.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Type definitions for line items, calculator state, and breakdown results.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Numeric parsing, clamping, and calculation helpers for subtotal, tax, discount, and line totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended theming, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and overall app goals for the total amount calculator project.
